column2: "Na Jakob tsenaa asaase a n'egya tsenaa do no do
column3: Keenan asaase do."

column2: "Iyi nye Jakob n'ebusua ho abakɔsɛm. Josef dzii mfe duesuon no
column3: nna ɔnye no nuanom rohwɛ nguan no; na ɔyɛ abofra a ɔnye n'egya ne yernom Bilha nye Zilpa hɔn mba na wɔwɔ hɔ: na Josef kɛkaa hɔn ho asɛmbɔn kyerɛɛ hɔn egya."

column2: "Afei nna Israel dɔ Josef sen ne mba nyinara
column3: osiandɛ ɔno nye no nkɔdaaber mu ba: na ɔyɛɛ asaasaaba atar fɛfɛɛfɛw bi maa no."

column2: "Na no nuanom no hun dɛ hɔn egya dɔ no sen hɔn nyinara no wɔtaan no
column3: na woenntum annkasa abodwee do annkyerɛ no."

column2: "Na Josef soo daa
column3: na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no nuanom no na nkyii wɔtaan no kɛse."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Meserɛ hom
column4: hom ntsie daa a maso yi:"

column2: "na hwɛ
column3: nna yɛrekyekyer ewifua ekuwekuw wɔ haban mu
column4: na
column9: hom ekuw no botwaa me dze no ho hyiae
column10: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa no."

column2: "Na no nuanom bisaa no dɛ
column3: Nna tserɛ ampaara dɛ ibedzi hɛn do hen nye no? Ana tserɛ ampaara dɛ ibenya hɛn do tum nye no? Na nkyii wɔtaan no kɛse wɔ n'adaaso no nye ne nsɛm no ntsi."

column2: "Na ɔsoo daa kor so
column3: na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no nuanom
column4: na ɔsee dɛ
column8: ewia nye bosoom nye nworaba dubiako robɔ hɔn mu adze ma me."

column2: "Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ n'egya nye no nuanom; na n'egya twuuw n'enyim
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Ebɛn daa na aso yi? Nna tserɛ ampaara dɛ emi nye wo na nye wo nuanom bɛba abɔbɔ hɛn mu adze wɔ famu ama wo nye no?"

column2: "Na no nuanom enyi beer no do; na n'egya dze ɔdze asɛm no too ne tsirmu."
column3: "#Ndwu 7.9"

column2: "Na no nuanom kɔree kɔhwɛɛ hɔn egya no nguan wɔ Sekem."
"Na Israel see Josef dɛ
column3: Ana wo nuanom nnyɛn mbowa wɔ Sekem bi a? Bra ma monsoma wo hɔn hɔ. Na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Emi nye yi."

column2: "Na Israel see no dɛ
column3: Afei kɔ
column4: kɔhwɛ dɛ wo nuanom
column5: nye nguan no hɔn ho ye; na san bɛka kyerɛ me. Nna ofi Hebron bɔnsa mu somaa no ma ɔbaa Sekem."

column2: "Na banyin bi hun no dɛ
column3: orikyin haban no mu: na banyin no bisaa no dɛ
column4: Erohwehwɛ ebɛnadze?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Morohwehwɛ mo nuanom: meserɛ wo ara
column4: kyerɛ me mbrɛ wɔwɔ rohwɛ nguan no."

column2: "Na banyin no see dɛ
column3: Woefi ha kɔ: na metsee dɛ wɔreka dɛ
column4: Wɔmma yɛnkɔ Dotan. Na Josef tsiiw no nuanom

column2: "Na no nuanom no hun no ekyirkyiikyir
column3: na ansaana ɔrebɛn hɔn no
column4: wɔkɔr ne tsir do apam dɛ woboku no."

column2: "Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ
column3: Wɔnhwɛ
column4: ɔdaasofo no na ɔreba no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei wɔmbra
column3: wɔmma yenku no
column4: na yɛntow no nkyen mona yi bi mu
column6: Abowa bɔn bi na ɔatsetsew no mu: na nkyii yɛnhwɛ mbrɛ n'adaaso no bowie."

column2: "Na Reuben tsee
column3: na ɔgyee no wɔ hɔn nsamu; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mma wɔmma yennku no;"

column2: "Mma hom nnka bɔgya: wɔmfa no nto sar do ha mona yi mu
column3: na mma wɔmmfa nsa nnka no: ɔreyɛ ama nkyɛ ɔaagye no wɔ hɔn nsamu dze no asan akɛma n'egya."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: Josef dur no nuanom no nkyɛn no
column4: wɔpɔɔr
column5: asaasaaba atar fɛɛfɛw a ɔhyɛ no no"

column2: "na wɔdze no kɔtoo mona mu: nna mona no mu awew a
column3: nsu nnyi mu."

column2: "Na wɔtsenaa famu dɛ woridzidzi no wɔmaa hɔn enyiwa do na wohun Ismaelfo akwantufo kuw bi dɛ wofi Gilead reba
column3: wɔnye hɔn efumpɔnkɔ a wɔsoso eduhuam nye ngo nye mɛɛr dze rokɔ Egypt."

column2: "Na Juda see no nuanom no dɛ
column3: Sɛ yeku hɛn nua na yesiw no bɔgyaa do a
column4: ebɛn mfaso na ɔwɔ mu?"

column2: "Hom mbra ma yɛntɔn no mma Ismaelfo yi
column3: na mma wɔmma yɛmmfa hɛn nsa nnka no; osiandɛ hɛn nua a
column4: hɛn bɔgyaa a. Na no nuanom no tsiee no."

column2: "Nna Midianfo eguadzifo bi rutwa mu; na woyii Josef fii mona no mu
column3: na wɔtɔɔn no maa Ismaelfo no gyee ndwetɛbona eduonu. Na wɔdze Josef kɔr Egypt."

column2: "Na ber a Reuben sanee baa mona no do no; hwɛ
column3: nna Josef nnyi mona no mu; na osunsuaan ne ntar mu."

column2: "Na ɔsanee kɔr no nuanom no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Abofra no nnyi hɔ; na iyi mara merefa hen?"

column2: "Na wɔfaa Josef n'atar no
column3: na wokum apɔnkyenyin
column4: na wɔdze atar no bɔɔ bɔgya no mu;"

column2: "na wɔdze asaasaaba atar fɛfɛɛfɛw no somae ma wɔdze kɛmaa hɔn egya
column3: kɛsee no dɛ
column4: Adze a yeehu nye yi: hwɛ kyerɛ dɛ wo ba n'atar a."

column2: "Na ɔhwɛe
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Me ba n'atar a; abowa bɔn bi na ɔakyer no; tsetsew na wɔatsetsew Josef no mu."

column2: "Na Jakob sunsuaan n'atar mu
column3: na ɔdze kɔben tam bɔɔ n'asen
column4: na osuu ne ba nda pii."

column2: "Na ne mbabanyin nye ne mbabaa nyinara bae dɛ wɔrebɛkyekye no werɛ; naaso oenntsie ma wɔannkyekye no werɛ; na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mibedzi yaw ara dze akɔ me ba nkyɛn wɔ samanadze. Na n'egya suu no."

column2: "Na Midianfo no kɔtɔɔn no wɔ Egypt maa Potifar
column3: Farao no somfo bi a ɔno nye abrafohen no."
